hadiths.text: Jabir said:"The Messenger of Allah delivered a Khutbah and mentioned a man among his Companions who had died and had been buried at night in a shroud that was not sufficient. The Messenger of Allah reprimanded them, telling them not to bury a person at night except in cases of emergency

chapter.ara-name: باب السَّاعَاتِ الَّتِي نُهِيَ عَنْ إِقْبَارِ الْمَوْتَى، فِيهِنَّ
chapter.eng-name: The Times During Which It Is Prohibited To Bury The Dead
